name: Cube Full of Mines
description:
Mastered the art of finding mines? Ready for a new challenge? Exchange the flat grid and challenge yourself to find mines on all sides of a cube. Drive your sense of direction mad as you scramble to find all the things that go boom in the fastest time you can by taking on a Cube Full of Mines!

We've taken the classic game and given it a new twist. The ability to play on all sides of a cube. Choose between three levels of difficulty as well as the additional ability to customize the size and number of mines. Choose your environment with two included themes: Classic and Space.
